title: The Panasonic 5-blade shaver ES-LV9A-S
description:
Taking full advantage of high-quality materials, this premium shaver is designed with detailed attention paid to texture and feel to provide the ultimate in functional beauty.
The new Multi-Flex 3D Head hugs your face, staying in close contact with your skin. The 30-degree acute-angle inner blades cut even the thickest hairs at the root. The Shaving Sensor and the Direct Linear Motor Drive deliver a shave that’s amazingly clean yet gentle on your skin. 
Experience a new way to shave.

asset.author: Channel Panasonic - Official

transcripts: Born of Panasonic's unique blade technology. The Panasonic 5-blade shavers LV series, 5 blades for maximum shaving. Gliding smoothly over the skin for an even gentler shave, the new multi-flex 3D head hugs your face staying in close contact with your skin. The 30 degree acute angle blades cut even the thickest hairs at the root. The shaving sensor and direct linear motor delivers a shake that's amazingly clean, and gentle on your skin. a Experience a new way to shave, the premium Panasonic  5 blade shaver LV Series.
